roleset.name: anti-inflate

example.name: crazy speculation
example.text: Some investors say Friday's sell-off was a good thing, because it deflated a lot of crazy takeover speculation.
example.arg: a lot of crazy takeover speculation

roleset.note: Frames file for 'deflate' based on sentences in wsj; nominal 'deflation' based on BOLT-7. Verbnet entry 45.4.

example.name: Nominal rel: deflation
example.text: They have been fighting the deflation of shadow money supply quite vigorously
